Captain.Title: K'Temoc
Captain.Ability: All of your Klingon Upgrades cost -1 SP. The faction penalty is doubled for any non-Klingon Upgrades assigned to your ship. K'Temoc may only field Klingon [ELITE TALENT] Upgrades.

Captain.Title: Morag
Captain.Ability: ACTION: If your ship is not Cloaked, disable all of your remaining Shields and target a ship at Range 1-2 that is not Cloaked and has no Active Shields. Disable 1 Upgrade of your choice on the target ship and place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

Captain.Title: Suran
Captain.Ability: ACTION: When attacking this round, during the Roll Attack Dice step, if you are within range 1 of a friendly ship, set 1 of your attack dice on the result of your choice. This die cannot be rolled or re-rolled.

Captain.Title: William Ross
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Target a ship within Range 1-2 that is in your forward firing arc. If the target ship attacks this round, that ship rolls 1 less attack die this round.
Captain.AdmiralAbility: FLEET ACTION: Target a ship within Range 1-2 that is in your forward firing arc. If the target ship attacks this round, that ship rolls 1 less attack die this round.

Captain.Title: Velal
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Each time you defend this round, during the Roll Defense Dice step, you may choose to roll 2 less defense dice. If you do so, add 1 [EVADE] result to your roll.
Captain.AdmiralAbility: FLEET ACTION: Each time you defend this round, during the Roll Defense Dice step, you may choose to roll 2 less defense dice. If you do so, add 1 [EVADE] result to your roll.

Captain.Title: Shanthi
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Target a ship at Range 1-2. When attacking that ship this round, you may re-roll all of your blank results once. In addition, if the target ship is Cloaked, immediately flip that ship's [CLOAK] Token over to its red side.
Captain.AdmiralAbility: FLEET ACTION: Target a ship at Range 1-2. When attacking that ship this round, you may re-roll all of your blank results once. In addition, if the target ship is Cloaked, immediately flip that ship's [CLOAK] Token over to its red side.

Captain.Title: Hayes
Captain.Ability: ACTION: All friendly ships within Range 1 of your ship gain +1 attack die this round (+2 attack dice against Borg ships).
Captain.AdmiralAbility: FLEET ACTION: All friendly ships within Range 1 of your ship gain +1 attack die this round (+2 attack dice against Borg ships).
